title: seek3r
author: seek3r
created_time: December 14, 2022, 11:29:02 PMLast edit: December 23, 2022, 10:07:15 PM by seek3r
content: The will be the first of a few auctions. Over the next few days/weeks I'll be breaking up the rest of my Coldkey collection and gradually offering it in auctions here.I have the complete History series for 2020 with the same serial - maybe interesting for one or the othern Coldkey Lover  First of all, I start off with Q1 of the series!Enclosed is a little reference: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5422960.msg61340893#msg61340893Up for sale are  5 LOTS of Coldkey cards - every LOT has the serial #22  made by yogg (Mr. Coldkey)The History series cards are loaded with the displayed amount, the COVID Coinfest and the Buyer funded version are unfundedLOT 1: History Series 2020 #22 "bc1qckqxgn..." - January STARTING BID: 0.008 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0005 BTC LOT 2: History Series 2020 #22 "bc1qckq935..." - Februar STARTING BID: 0.006 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0005 BTC LOT 3: History Series 2020 #22 "bc1qckqrst..." - MarchSTARTING BID: 0.007 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0005 BTC LOT 4: Confest UK COVID 2020 #22 "bc1qckqt44..." STARTING BID: 0.002 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0005 BTC LOT 5: Coldkey Buyer funded v1 #22 "bc1qckqy7g..." STARTING BID: 0.002 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0005 BTC END TIME: December 23th, 2022, 23:00:00 GMT+1 (Hamburg time) TIMER: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?iso=20221223T23&p0=307&font=cursiveAUCTION TERMSSNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: I only accept Bitcoin to following address: 33eedyLSbqawsLZWexYxioHzvYDSxZ84xYPayment has to be done within 24 hours after the auction has ended.SHIPPING: WORLDWIDEShipping costs will be paid by the winner, winner is also responsible for any local customs/duties/VAT fees.Item will be shipped from Germany.ESCROW: Accepted at buyers expense - would prefer minerjones' service*** I also reserve the right to exclude anyone from bidding if they got a bunch of negative trust. ***
